GE plans counterbid for Invensys - reportGE plans counterbid for Invensys: report LONDON U.S. General Electric  is gearing up for a 3.5 billion pound ($5.3 billion) counterbid for British engineer Invensys  that would trump last week's offer from France's Schneider Electric
